wiki.content:
"Believe Me" is the third single from Fort Minor's debut album, The Rising Tied. Two versions of the CD single were released. The track features Eric Bobo of Cypress Hill. The main melody of the song is from Apple Inc.'s GarageBand loops named "Strings 08". In the end of the song, it is heard that Mike Shinoda says, "Okay, so here's the thing".
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "Believe Me" is the third single from Fort Minor's debut album, The Rising Tied. Two versions of the CD single were released. The track features Eric Bobo of Cypress Hill. The main melody of the song is from Apple Inc.'s GarageBand loops named "Strings 08". In the end of the song, it is heard that Mike Shinoda says, "Okay, so here's the thing".
